result.reason: The internal browser (WebView2) currently creates a temporary user data folder for each session and deletes it on close, preventing passwords from being saved. This behavior needs to be configurable.
result.approach: Add a new 'BrowserPersistentUserData' boolean property to connection settings. Update HTTPBase to use a stable user data folder path (hashed from connection ID) and skip deletion on close when this property is enabled.
